lead_paragraph: The Norwegian designer departed after just a year and a half in the job at the Florence-based brand, known for its flesh-baring and flamboyant designs.
snippet: The Norwegian designer departed after just a year and a half in the job at the Florence-based brand, known for its flesh-baring and flamboyant designs....

headline.main: Peter Dundas Leaves as Creative Director of Roberto Cavalli
headline.print_headline: Musical Chairs Persists With Shuffle at Cavalli
